sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Squadron & Troop Mortars conduct Mortar Gunnery from 15 NOV – 08 DEC 2023 in order to certify all Sections to support IDF requirements IAW GTA SOP #1 requirement and TC 3-20.33 (AUG ‘17 edition).
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: Recertify Gun Crews and FDC to maintain training proficiency on 60mm, 81mm, and 120mm Mortar Systems.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Complete TBL 1 (Gunner’s Exam) for all 11C Complete TBL 2-3 (FDC 1 and 2 Exams) for all Section Chiefs and Leaders
CFFT simulator completed by unit FOs, to synchronize, Fires certification Complete TBL IV-VI Mortar LFX
sections.END STATE:
MTR Platoon and TRP Sections qualify on their respective weapon systems and FDC criteria.
Training Objectives
Conduct hasty TLPs and issue FRAGOs
Conduct the maneuver of a squad
Develop an engagement area
Conduct an anti-tank engagement
React to direct fire contact while dismounted
Establish and conduct a support by fire
Exercise direct fire control measures
Coordinate with adjacent units
